E

eval(State) - Method in class NAME_ME_Player
Returns an evaluation of the given state from the perspective of playerSymbol (inherited from PlayerDef).
A positive score is good for this player - the higher the better.

Ultimately, this will be minimax with alpha-beta pruning, but get plain old minimax working first, and save a copy of it in case you mess something up while working on alpha-beta pruning.

getPiece(int, int) - Method in class State
Returns the piece ('X', 'O', or '_') at the given column and row.
getTerminalStatus() - Method in class State
Returns 'X' if X has won, 'O' if O has won, 'C' if it's a cat (tie) game (full board with no winner), '_' if the game is still going.
